name: Saukatali Masi
title: Data Analyst
about_me: I am an IT student specializing in software and web development. I love building logical and user-friendly applications. My goal is to start my career in a reputed organization where I can improve my skills and contribute to the team's success.

education.details: Currently pursuing Master of Computer Application at Reva University, focusing on software development, database management, and cloud technologies. Actively improving programming skills through academic projects and practical learning.

Learned fundamentals of programming, data structures, and web development. Completed projects using Java, Python, and HTML/CSS. Achieved 8.20 CGPA and developed strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

experience.details: Completed 3 months of remote work experience as a Web Developer Intern. Worked on real projects using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, PHP, and SQL to improve website UI and database functionality. Developed industry-level skills and gained confidence in professional development.
